title: The Farmer
description: The Farmer is a 3D farming simulator game where the player cultivates the field, sows the seeds, waters them and carries out pesticide operations with a tractor.  It is a game where the players can perform every operation they can think of in the field of farming.  It is also a realistic simulation game for those who want to enter this field in real life.  Get in the seat of your tractor, take the necessary farm tools and head to your land in this virtual farming world!
